Package semsim.writing

Class AbstractRDFwriter

java.lang.Object
semsim.writing.AbstractRDFwriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
OMEXmetadataWriter, SemSimRDFwriter
public abstract class AbstractRDFwriter
extends java.lang.Object
Class for serializing SemSim annotations in RDF format, either within XML-based modeling files such as SBML and CellML, or in OMEX metadata files used within OMEX archives.
Author:
mneal

    • setModelNamespaceInRDF

      public void setModelNamespaceInRDF​(java.lang.String modelnamespace)
      Set the namespace to use for RDF resources that refer to explicit elements in the annotated model
      Parameters:
      modelnamespace - Model namespace to use

    • setFreeTextAnnotationForObject

      public void setFreeTextAnnotationForObject​(SemSimObject sso, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource ares)
      Write out an RDF statement that captures the free-text annotation on a SemSimObject
      Parameters:
      sso - A SemSimObject with a free-text annotation
      ares - RDF Resource representing the object

    • convertURItoIdentifiersDotOrgFormat

      public static java.net.URI convertURItoIdentifiersDotOrgFormat​(java.net.URI uri)
      Reformat a URI so it conforms to the Identifiers.org URI format
      Parameters:
      uri - An input URI
      Returns:
      Idenntifiers.org-formatted version of the URI

    • getLocalNamespace

      public java.lang.String getLocalNamespace()
      Returns:
      The namespace used for RDF resources that are instantiated for annotation but do not refer to explicit elements in the annotated model

    • getModelNamespace

      public java.lang.String getModelNamespace()
      Returns:
      The namespace to use for RDF resources that refer to elements in the annotated model

      public org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getRDFModel()
      Accessor for the rdf model.
      Returns:
      The Jena rdf model stored in this object.

      public java.lang.String getRDFString​(java.lang.String rdfxmlformat)
      Instance-level method for getting the RDF content as a string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the RDF content.

    • getRDFString

      public java.lang.String getRDFString()
      Instsance-level method for getting the RDF content as a string (overload uses default format "RDF/XML-ABBREV").
      Returns:
      A string containing the RDF content.

    • getRDFmodelAsString

      public static java.lang.String getRDFmodelAsString​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model rdf, java.lang.String rdfxmlformat)
      Parameters:
      rdf - An RDF Model object
      rdfxmlformat - The format to use when writing the Model to a String. Use "RDF/XML-ABBREV" if writing a standalone model (CellML, SBML, JSim project file). Use "RDF/XML" for metadata files in OMEX archives.
      Returns:
      A String representation of an RDF Model
